requestParams.name: check_order_status
requestParams.desc: 盘点单状态（CHECKING(1, "盘点中"), DONE(2, "已完成"), CANCEL(3, "已作废")）

requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: warehouse_ids
requestParams.desc: 仓库id列表  注意：连锁版必填

children.name: idempotent_no
children.desc: 幂等单号（请求唯一标识）

children.name: type
children.desc:
业务类型（STOCK_CHECK(1, "库存盘点单"),
  STOCK_IN(2, "采购入库单"),
  STOCK_RETURN(3, "退货入库单"),
  STOCK_OUT(4, "出库单")）

children.name: source_order_no
children.desc: 退货入库单用于记录关联订单号

children.name: status
children.desc:
状态（DOING(1, "待处理"),
  DONE(2, "处理成功"),
  FAIL(3, "处理失败")）

children.name: amount
children.desc: 系统库存数量，amount= realAmount - oldAmount

children.name: real_amount
children.desc: 实际库存数量,变更后的值
